name: 8 Ball Billiards-Pool Billiards Pro Star balls Game
name_original: 8 Ball Billiards-Pool Billiards Pro Star balls Game
description:
Welcome to the billiard master professional game! This is the number one billiard game on Android, and it is completely free!

Game features:
1. Realistic 3D physical effects
2. Touch control to move the cue
3. The game has 8 balls and 9 Ball
4. Single player mode:
4.1 Man-machine battle (with rules)
4.2 Time mode (without rules)
-Challenge mode (2 minutes time limit to challenge the high score record)
-Practice mode (no time limit and no high score record)
5. Networked Battle (with rules)
newly added online battle function, you can play against players around the world in real time online! Winning the game can get chips to buy cool clubs or participate in more advanced games! Come and collect free chips for intense and exciting games!
6. Arcade mode: 90 challenge levels (no billiard rules)

Gameplay:
1. Human-machine battle mode (with rules)
and computer AI battle, with standard 8-ball and 9-ball rules. Touch the screen to adjust the direction, drag the bar on the right, and release the ball after hitting. In free ball mode, press and hold any position to move the cue ball, and click the cue ball again to confirm the location.
